snippet: JEE--Stephen, 89 of Riverdale, NY died December 24, 2013. He is survived by his wife Dorothy, children: Victor, Lester and Kathy, and granddaughter: Dyrdra. He was loved by friends and family and will be greatly missed by all....
lead_paragraph: JEE--Stephen, 89 of Riverdale, NY died December 24, 2013. He is survived by his wife Dorothy, children: Victor, Lester and Kathy, and granddaughter: Dyrdra. He was loved by friends and family and will be greatly missed by all.
